message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $150. I believe this is a fair price considering its value.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer but $150 is too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $70 for the product.
Hello Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While $150 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $120. This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, thanks for coming down on the price.  I can go up to $85 but that's my limit.
